SUPER DISTRO
"SUPER DISTRO" is a hard-as-nails 2D platformer in the style of retro games such as Megaman, Super Mario Bros 2: The Lost Levels and other such rage-inducing classics. Taking "Difficult gameplay" to a whole new level - SUPER DISTRO is not for the faint-of-heart. The weak need not apply.

Recent updates View all (7)

November 5

Progress on upcoming update! + OST for the update is out!

Hello everyone!

Sorry for the long wait but the new and improved version of SUPER DISTRO is almost upon us!

Thanks for all the positive comments and all the critical feedback and just being all round awesome people!

The new update is coming along fantastically and should be released hopefully in the next few weeks. The reason it has taken so long is because it's a complete re-write from the ground up of the game - To fix all the problems reported via the community hub and from reviews.

However, There is a small problem that you may be able to help out with: With taking all the feedback on board; The new update completely changes the game. This is awesome as the updated version looks awesome and plays awesome. However, I'm not sure if people will still want to play this version of the game (Yes, The update is THAT radically different).

So I'd like to ask: Would you rather just the update to overwrite the main game files or would you like the choice of either playing the updated version and this "Legacy" version?

Post a comment to this update with either: "Both" if you want both or "Just the update" if you think we should focus on just keeping the update to keep the file-size in check.

That's all I have to report for now; If any of you have spoken to me in the past few months; You'll know I've been hard at work remaking the game from the ground up to be less rage-inducing and more like a game you WANT to play.

Thanks for all the comments and feedback; It's been really, really helpful as I fix the mess I let out on the world - Sorry again for that!

Speak soon everyone, You're totally awesome! :)

-----

P.S - Want a sneak peak at the new update? How about the soundtrack?! - https://kitatus.bandcamp.com/album/super-distro-dx-directors-cut - If you select buy now and select 0.00, You can download it completely for free!

I hope you like the new direction :)

9 comments Read more

August 26

Feedback and Upcoming update

Hello everyone (I hope you're all having an awesome day!)

I don't know how to start this - So I'll get right to the point: A lot of you don't like the game.

I understand this - I understand all the issues raised and I'm personally making it my mission to make sure you all leave with smiles on your faces as opposed to the negative feelings a lot of you are feeling right now.

So let's break down what I've learnt:
- It's TOO hard. Not in difficulty, But in cheap-ness.
- The artstyle sucks (And feels like a flash game)
- The music is ehh... (I made it in a day when the audio guy crapped out on me - That's not an excuse, But more a reason).
+ A heck of a lot more feedback.

I apologise that so many of you have had a negative experience to the title. I have worked in creating video-games for a little over 10 years, However this was my first commerical product.

I can see that a lot of you feel "Cheated" in some way because of what you expected / What you recieved.

So what am I going to do about it? - The next update you'll download should fix A LOT of original issues with the title. I have learnt a lot from releasing the title and I hope to learn even more.

I do not want to "Overhype" the update; So I'll get straight to working on it and will hopefully have it in your Steam libraries as soon as humanly possible.

For this reason, I've delayed all future versions of the game until it's a game that more people enjoy that dislike.

Don't be fooled, I have read everything posted (Almost every hour I'm awake, I jump to see what you are all saying) and have taken everything on-board.

I apologize from the bottom-of-my-heart that a lot of you experienced something negative from SUPER DISTRO but I hope that with some extra hard-work and elbow-grease - You'll all come to love SUPER DISTRO.

I could blame a lot of things for why it turned out the way it did - But it all boils down to this one thing: There is no excuse. There's no excuse why you had to waste your time playing the title, Which wasn't enjoyable. There's no excuse for creating a game that isn't enjoyable for you guys 'n gals - And that's why I made this - For you. To enjoy. If you're not enjoying it then I've done something wrong.

So I'm going literally back to the drawing board and will fire the new update out ASAP. Expect big changes and fixes and I hope to hear all your feedback as we reshape SUPER DISTRO together.

Thank-you everyone for all your feedback - It's been awesome to read the good and bad stuff - It shows you care enough to try out SUPER DISTRO - Which is awesome!

Have a wonderful day/morning/evening gaming, And I hope to speak to you all again soon - With a new update in hand!

- Ryan

25 comments Read more

About This Game

CONQUER THE BATTLEFIELD WITH SUPER-POWERED ABILITIES AND THE SKILL OF YOUR HOARDING!

"SUPER DISTRO" is a hard-as-nails (Seriously, Who comes up with these idioms?) 2D platformer in the style of retro games such as Megaman, Super Mario Bros 2: The Lost Levels and other such rage-inducing classics. Taking "Difficult gameplay" to a whole new level - SUPER DISTRO is not for the faint-of-heart. You will die again and again. The weak need not apply - Only those who are determined to overcome impossible odds will find victory here and those are the rules of the land in SUPER DISTRO.

In the words of a certain sour-tasting character from a popular television show: "We've have it all!"

"SUPER DISTRO" is hopefully unlike anything you've ever played before (We promise that's a good thing!) - Taking familiar staples of excellent games of yesteryear and throwing bucketloads of creativity and innovation (And wall-punching difficulty!) on top; You'll be delighted with the result! Everything has been loving handcrafted by a single guy (With a little help from his friends!) to make sure SUPER DISTRO a stupidly enjoyable, Yet rage-inducing experience.
READ MORE

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • OS: 64-bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Hard Drive: 10 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: 64-bit: Win 7, Win 8, Win 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K 3.50GHz / AMD FX-9590 4.7GHz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX760 / AMD R9 280X
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Hard Drive: 10 GB available space
READ MORE

Static10101
968 products in account
47 reviews
Not Recommended
3.4 hrs on record
Posted: August 9
If you watched the trailer and thought to yourself: "This must be a joke," then you are right. The humor ends right past the intro. The game has the nerve to present you with a "challenge" that appears to be retro inspired, however the real challenge are the sloppy and god-awful controls.

4/10.

[edit: Having browsed the forums, I see that the developer is heavily involved with the community. I have a lot of respect for this and raised my score from 1 to 4 for this reason.]
